`r descr_models("surv_reg", "survival")`

## Tuning Parameters

This model has no tuning parameters.

## Translation from parsnip to the original package

```{r flexsurv-reg}
surv_reg() %>% 
  set_engine("flexsurv") %>% 
  set_mode("regression") %>% 
  translate()
```
